attributes.additional_details:
At present there is a clear and widening divide of those in broadband poverty

I would like all plans for fibre broadband " up to 75mb" squashed , as no one actually needs 75mb only universities or businesses.

I am petitioning for the government to stop aiming so high to benefit so few. and to look at the averages in areas and increase pressure or funds to bring many homes in many areas into the 21st century.

the benefits outweigh the costs long term.
everybody should have a acceptable speeds.

I hope I haver explained myself well. and thank you for your time.
